raw:
{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Maia's Farewell
| icon           = poe2 plain_letter icon.png
| description    = Captain,

I'm gone. Leaving now saves me a bullet that I might need later, so don't expect to see me again unless you want to collect that final shot in person.

Ishiza wanted to defecate all over your dumb boat, but I told him to go overboard. Taught him better than that, but it seems you just bring out the worst in people.

I want my stupid brother back.

~Maia
